## Hi there!
Thanks for stopping by my little corner. My name is Asiwome Ameko, and I'm excited to meet you.

**Health Data Analyst** at the [Trust Research Data labs](https://asiwome.netlify.app/), working on areas including health data analytics, clinical data management, health econometrics and spatial data science. 

Also working as a **Health Information Officer** at the [Tamale teaching Hospital](http://www.tth.gov.gh/), where I doing a lot of health data management, analytics and reporting tasks, support clinical staffs and researchers from research study design to publication of results.
